mdRecord.dcterms:title: Map of triangulation survey now in progress by the Clinchfield Coal Corporation in Wise, Russell, Dickenson and Bushanan Counties, Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Clinchfield Coal Corporation.
Norris Peters Co.
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 46 x 38 cm. on sheet 54 x 44 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: "Richd. I. Dereton Del." (?) appears just outside left lower neatline.
A scale statement of 1 inch = 1 mile has been struck out, and replaced with a bar scale (smaller scale).
Explanation table is coded for various triangulation stations, lines, railroads, county and state lines, towns, villages or post offices.
"An original copy of this map is filed with the U.S.G.S. along with the notes, computations, &c." -- Lower left corner.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Coalfields--Virginia, Southwest--Maps.
Virginia, Southwest--Surveys--Maps.
Virginia--Maps.
